attributes.action: Remove all speed bumps, or cushions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These nasty obstacles damage vehicles, create more polution, and are a constant pain to people with bad backs and casualties within ambulances. Their construction is highly variable, you never know what speed to approach them at to reduce the potential damage, I was also under the impression that they are only supposed to keep you under the speed limit, just try driving over one at 30mph.... or even 20mph !
